com.irurueta.server.commons.email

Class AWSHtmlEmailMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.EmailMessage<E>
      • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.HtmlEmailMessage<javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage>
        • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.JavaMailHtmlEmailMessage
          • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.AWSHtmlEmailMessage

  • public class AWSHtmlEmailMessage
extends JavaMailHtmlEmailMessage
    Class to build emails having HTML markup as in webpages using Amazon SES. These kind of emails are useful for marketing purposes or simply to get a nicer layout. Files can be attached as in text emails, or they can be sent inline so they can be used within the html content (such as images or css resources to be used within html email body).

    • Method Detail

      • isCCSupported

        public boolean isCCSupported()
        Indicates if CC is supported for this kind of email to send Carbon Copies of this email. Some email types do not support this feature.
        Overrides:
        isCCSupported in class EmailMessage<javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage>
        Returns:
        true if CC feature is supported, false otherwise.

      • isBCCSupported

        public boolean isBCCSupported()
        Indicates if BCC is supported for this kind of email to send Blind Carbon Copies of this email. Some email types do not support this feature.
        Overrides:
        isBCCSupported in class EmailMessage<javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage>
        Returns:
